item.title: TryHackMe Simple CTF
item.description: OverView Simple CTF room Simple CTF Task 01: Simple CTF How many services are running under port 1000? recon nmap sudo nmap -p 0-999 10.10.38.103 -v -oN 1000-port Starting Nmap 7.60 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2021-07-19 18:14 BST Initiating ARP Ping Scan at 18:14 Scanning 10.10.38.103 [1 port] Completed ARP Ping Scan at 18:14, 0.
